-e ---

𔐃 Netz-Rock-Mann (netted-shirt-shaman/deity) 𔐃
Very widespread deity of early pioneer religion, especially widespread in Mesopotamia and Anatolia.

𒀭𒋫𒅅 an-ta-ĝal₂ נאצל ᵃnéétsal noble +++

𔐃 mesh-man often wears the very noticable horned crown, meshed shirt (a novelty at this time?) and hooked shoes.

Other famous heros of that time:

"Tamer of two beasts" 𓀪 𓀫 𓀬 Tyrant / Lady of two felines

𓀗 Hiero (old man senior)
𓀘 Hero
𓀙 Arier
